sourcesContent:
import MyGrid from '../components/MyGrid';
import {Form} from 'semantic-ui-react'

const adminDropdown = [
    { key: 'o', text: '', value: '' },
    { key: 'y', text: 'Yes', value: 'yes' },
    { key: 'n', text: 'No', value: 'no' },
]
export default (props) => {
    return (<>
    <MyGrid 
        columnNum = {2} 
        header={props.title}
    >
        <Form size="large">
            <Form.Input
                fluid
                icon="user"
                iconPosition="left"
                placeholder="Username"
                onChange={handleLoginChange}
                name='user'
                type='text'
            />
            <Form.Input
                fluid
                icon="lock"
                iconPosition="left"
                placeholder="Password"
                type="password"
                onChange={handleLoginChange}
                name='password'
            />
            <Form.Select
                fluid
                label='Is this user an Admin'
                options={adminDropdown}
                name='Admin'
            />
        </Form>
    </MyGrid>
    </>)
}
